Course Description: THIS COURSE APPLIES ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES USING POPULAR ACCOUNTING SOFTWARE SUCH AS QUICKBOOKS, PEACHTREE, OR GREAT PLAINS TO PREPARE AND INTERPRET ACCOUNTING INFORMATION. THE COURSE FOCUSES ON SMALL BUSINESS APPLICATIONS.
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major: STUDENTS WILL BE EXPOSED TO A POPULAR ACCOUNTING SOFTWARE SUCH AS QUICKBOOKS, PEACHTREE, OR GREAT PLAINS TO PREPARE AND INTERPRET ACCOUNTING INFORMATION.  STUDENTS WILL WORK THROUGH A COMPLETE ACCOUNTING CYCLE USING A FULL FEATURED ACCOUNTING SOFTWARE PACKAGE. THIS WILL INCLUDE THE GENERAL LEDGER, ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE, ACCOUNTS PAYABLE, INVENTORY, RATE CHART MASTER, PAYROLL AND BUDGETING. STUDENTS WILL ALSO BE ABLE TO PREPARED NECESSARY FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND LEARN HOW TO ANALYZE THEM.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
